name: Astro Hero 3D
description:
Capture as many prey as possible in the beautiful space planet! Can you finish the longest taxi?

If your head touches your tail, you will die and the game over. Capturing prey as quickly as possible allows you to get higher scores. Challenge yourself and explore the unknown planet!

Download now and start to slide! Good luck!

If you have any questions or comments, feel free to contact us at feedback@kiwifungames.com

Privacy Policy: https://kiwifun-game-privacy-policy.weebly.com/
Terms of Use: https://kiwifun-game-privacy-policy.weebly.com/terms-of-service.html
